title: Kroger Co.
description: Kroger Co. primarily operates in the retail and grocery industry. The brand is widely recognized by its distinctive dark blue color, with the hex code #084999. This color scheme is a key component of Kroger's visual identity, as seen in various brand assets, including media sourced from https://media.graphassets.com/PBJQqS70QVWm3qfNGWZF.
